title: Right of Privacy
creator_credit: Warren Steibel and National Educational Television
brief_description: A report on the governmental and business activities which pose a threat to individual privacy today, and the possible elimination of all privacy should the National Data Centre be established. Officials speak out on the need to protect citizens. The National Sata Bank is discussed as a collection of statistics and as a potential threat to individual freedom.
